item.title: Using Python to fight Malaria
item.description:
Description

Malaria is a mosquito-borne disease that killed 438,000 people in 2015. Using the Python ecosystem, we are building the first open database for blood smears used in malaria diagnosis, together with an E-learning platform to train technicians. We also aim to develop automated diagnosis of malaria.
item.dc:creator: Pierre Poulain
